body.raw:
{
    "id": "c5009089-c88c-4567-8e3e-84c4c1af8488",
    "department_id": "4084916e-1d44-4bf2-ba11-1a10264e064b",
    "code": "BSCS",
    "name": "Bachelor of Science in Computer Science",
    "level": "Bachelor's",
    "duration": "4",
    "description": "The BSSE (Bachelor of Science in Computer Science) program is a four-year undergraduate degree designed to provide students with a strong foundation in computing, programming, algorithms, software development, databases, networks, and emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and data science. It combines theory with practical skills, preparing graduates for careers in software engineering, IT, research, and entrepreneurship, as well as for advanced studies in computer science and related fields."
}
